strapiPost.title: Mountains, Water, Trails, or Roads
strapiPost.content:
Are you thinking about holiday gifts yet? Well, beardedgoat is having a sale, and you should check it out. 

  • 15% off: This is how much the outdoor apparel company is offering anyone who makes a purchase at its one and only Flagship Store on the square in downtown Fayetteville. 
  • Outdoor prep: The shop in Fayetteville is outfitted with local, handcrafted woodwork and stocked with the employeeâ€™s bikes and boards for decoration. Beardedgoat exists to get people outside and on adventures, so go check it out and start yours. 

Check out beardedgoat HERE.
